ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 244
ygData.msgSnippet: It is true they upped the MR on ALL gaurds... Personally i kill human gaurds (Qeynos to be exact) And although it is a bit of a pain, at lvl 40 it really
ygData.messageBody:
It is true they upped the MR on ALL gaurds... Personally i kill human gaurds
(Qeynos to be exact) And although it is a bit of a pain, at lvl 40 it really
doesnt matter because most are blue unless they are high ranking gaurds such
as captains ect... I still kill them , and get awsome xp..

----- Original Message -----
From: <jbuckingham@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2000 3:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 244


> From: jbuckingham@...
>
>
> > Sometimes the guard killers get a bit more bloodthirsty and kill him.
If
> > you /petition, the GMs can repop him.
>
> > Pasketti, Povar
>
> There is a problem there though - Jogl is a target for a Paladin quest,
the
> Deepwater Harpoon/Deep-Six Cutlass.. Yeah I know its stupid for a Paladin
> to kill a gnome, along with a dwarf and a human, but thats Verant for ya.
> He has a really long spawn time from what I've seen too, along the lines
of
> a day or more :( Though on the plus side, a friend of mine told me they
> upped the resist rate on the gnome guards, so there's been less guard
> killers around than normal :)
